Kalau masa interview HR tanya Why Are You Leaving Your Current Job? Ramai akan cakap keluar dari comfort zone ataupun nak gain new experience. Jawapan basic. Bosan. Ni contoh jawapan kalau nak jawab pasal gaji culture atau pasal korang tak suka kerja tu. Apa nak takut.

They don't want to pay compensation. That's why diorang minta y'all resign. Kalau y'all kena lay off diorang wajib bayar at least one month salary. So no ask to be laid off. Don't resign unless you already have a new job as a backup. https://t.co/FYhwaJltYc
